Sample.Title: mNCSC_No_EV_1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: mNCSCs in the negative control group were not given any EVs from placental cells before having their RNA collected mNCSCs in this treatment group were given EVs isolated from undifferentiated mTSCs, and incubated with the EVs for ~24 hours prior to RNA collection mNCSCs in this treatment group were given EVs isolated from undifferentiated pTGCs, and incubated with the EVs for ~24 hours prior to RNA collection
Channel.Growth-Protocol: mNCSCs were maintained in an undifferentiated state in mNCSC medium with FGF4, EGF, and heparin; cells were passaged ~24 hours before receiving treatment; mNCSCs given; pTGCs were differentiated from mTSCs for 6 days in exosome-free 70% MEF-conditioned medium with retinoic acid and had EVs isolated from their culture medium at day 6 of differentiation; mTSCs were cultured for 2 days in exosome-free 70% MEF-conditioned medium with FGF4 and heparin to maintain undifferentiated state and had EVs isolated from their clulture medium at day 2 of growth
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA was harvested using Rneasy mini plus kit (Qiagen). 500ng of total RNA was used for the construction of sequencing libraries. RNA libraries for RNA-seq were prepared using the Illumina Stranded mRNA Library Prep Kit following manufacturer's protocols.

Sample.Data-Processing: raw reads were were mapped to GRCm39 using STAR v.2.7.10b (with options --outFilterScoreMinOverLread 0.3 and --outFilterMatchNminOverLread 0.3 ) featureCounts v.2.0.3 was used for generating raw counts using gencode.vM30 GTF file, at exon level, per gene. Reads were treated as pairs and merged counts for all sampled were created Read count extraction and normalization were performed using DESeq2 on Rstudio. Enrichment tests on the differentially expressed genes were performed using TissueEnrich against the mouse Encode dataset and using enrichR databases Assembly: GRCm39 Supplementary files format and content: tab-delimited text files include raw counts values for each Sample

Series.Title: Extracellular Vesicle contents of mouse trophoblast cells and their predicted influence on fetal brain development
Series.Summary: Current work characterizes mRNA expression derived from mouse neural cortical stem cells incubated with and without EVs derived from either mouse parietal trophoblast giant cells or mouse trophoblast stem cells
Series.Overall-Design: Four replicates each for three different treatments, total of 12 samples and 3 conditions (1 control).
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
